name: BAM - Astroid Buster - Hardest Game Ever
name_original: BAM - Astroid Buster - Hardest Game Ever
description:
BAM, BAM, BAM.. BOOOOOOM!!!

Fly through the galaxy full of astroids.. Blow them or get blown away... watch out for the alien ships.. they spit fire balls.. those astroids are out to get you...
